document.full_text: egypt's military rulers will meet with palestinian president mahmoud abbas on thursday to seek ways to ease tension between his fatah movement and its rival hamas, egypt's state news agency said on saturday.
document.title: egypt's army rulers to meet palestinian president
lines_and_colors: egypt's military rulers will meet with palestinian president mahmoud abbas on thursday to seek ways to ease tension between his fatah movement and its rival hamas, egypt's state news agency said on saturday.
